text: ye log hai jinhone kaha ke Allah taâ€™ala ne hamein hukm diya hai ke kisi rasool ko na maane, jab tak wo hamaare paas aisi qurbaani na laaye, jise aag kha jaaye, aap keh dijiye ke agar tum sacche ho to mujh se pehle tumhaare paas jo rasool digar maujezo ke saath ye bhi laaye jise tum keh rahe ho, to phir tum ne unhe kyo maar daala
